chunks.cleaned_english_translation: This work (Q. Julius Hilarianus - Little Book on the Duration of the World) was translated before the implementation of the interlinear JSON format. To view the original Latin and English translation separately, please visit: https://github.com/wryan14/Latin-Patristic-Texts/tree/main/Patrologia_Latina/vol_13/Q.%20Julius%20Hilarianus%20-%20Little%20Book%20on%20the%20Duration%20of%20the%20World
